SEARCH
Module webfx.extras.player
Package dev.webfx.extras.player

Interface FeatureSupport

All Known Implementing Classes:
FeatureSupportImpl
public interface FeatureSupport
Indicates what level of support the player is offering for a feature (ex: navigation, mute, fullscreen). Note that this is once the media is loaded. Features available on start are different and should be requested via Player.getSupportedStartOptions().
Author:
Bruno Salmon
